body: Responsibilities:• Develop PHP applications for high-volume, high-availability and performance using the latest PHP technologies and frameworks;• Design, develop, maintain and optimize secure and scalable web applications and web services;• Develop, debug and improve modules and application specific features, taking into account technical constraints;• Design and develop reusable libraries, modules and APIs.  to contribute to best practices in PHP application development;• Work with system administrators, solution architects and developers to deliver applications quickly and dynamically;• Be able to write clean code with appropriate comments, ensuring that it meets the technical standards;• Provide support to team members whenever required.Requirements:• Solid experience with PHP and Laravel Framework;• Advanced knowledge in relational database (MySQL), query optimisation, plan and maintain databases;• Front End knowledge: JavaScript, HTML, jQuery and Smarty;• Good knowledge of techniques and concepts regarding Internet Security;• Basic experience with HTML5, CSS3, XML and JSON;• Nice to have experience with: memcache, video encoding and playback, beanstalk, payment processors;• Attention to details with a focus on quality of work;• Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
title: Senior Web Developer
locations: Str. Garlei nr. 1B Sector 1, București, Municipiul București, România
